General.Name: Electronic City Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Electronic City Indonesia Tbk engages in the trade of electronic goods in Indonesia. The company operates through three segments: Sales of Branded Electronic Goods, Rents, and Others. It offers products in the categories of audio-video products, information technology and mobile phone products, office equipment and cameras, and household appliances, as well as mom and baby products. The company sells its products through online stores. It is also involved in the property business. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Kawasan Niaga Terpadu Sudirman Lot 22, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12190
